enrichmentTriggers.comment: Counts detected enrichment triggers (tracks even when enrichment disabled)

metaEntityFormation.comment: Meta-entities are abilities/rules that emerged from clustering, marked with meta-entity tag

hardState.name: Aurora Berg
hardState.description: A towering, many-tiered iceberg whose shelves host rival super-penguin colonies.

hardState.name: Aurora Stack
hardState.description: A vertical colony carved into the sunlit face of Aurora Berg, known for orderly terraces and bright trade banners.

hardState.name: Nightfall Shelf
hardState.description: A shadowed ledge on the far side of Aurora Berg, lit by bioluminescent ice glyphs and whispered deals.

hardState.name: Krill Shoals
hardState.description: Dense drifting clouds of krill that pass regularly beneath Aurora Stack, the lifeblood of its fisheries.

hardState.name: The Glow-Fissure
hardState.description: A deep crack in the ice under Nightfall Shelf that pulses with otherworldly light and warps the currents.

hardState.name: Windward Ridge
hardState.description: A knife-edge crest of ice where the high winds carve strange patterns and carry news between colonies.

hardState.name: The Icebound Exchange
hardState.description: A merchant guild that monopolizes trade through Aurora Stack, issuing carved-ice credit chits and regulating fish prices.

hardState.name: The Midnight Claws
hardState.description: A clandestine syndicate ruling Nightfall Shelf from the shadows, smuggling forbidden tech and siphoning magic from the Glow-Fissure.

hardState.name: High-Beak Auditor Selka
hardState.description: The meticulous mayor of Aurora Stack, famed for balancing ledgers as easily as she balances on sheer ice walls.

hardState.name: Tide-Splitter Rukan
hardState.description: A daring super-penguin hero of Aurora Stack, whose experimental fishing gun techniques doubled the colonyâ€™s catch.

hardState.name: Shadow-Broker Nyla
hardState.description: The unofficial mayor of Nightfall Shelf, a veiled negotiator who settles disputes before anyone admits they exist.

hardState.name: Fissure-Walker Draen
hardState.description: A reckless hero of Nightfall Shelf who walks the very lip of the Glow-Fissure to draw power from its light.

hardState.name: Fissure-Drawn Runes
hardState.description: A school of ice-magic where glowing sigils are etched with claws chilled in the light of the Glow-Fissure.

hardState.name: Harmonic Harpoon Arrays
hardState.description: Advanced fishing guns that fire sonic-locked harpoons, letting penguins reel in entire shoals with minimal effort.

hardState.name: The Great Thaw
hardState.description: A period of exploration and colony founding as the ice recedes

hardState.name: The Faction Wars
hardState.description: Resource scarcity leads to inter-colony conflicts

hardState.name: The Clever Ice Age
hardState.description: Technology and magic flourish as penguins seek solutions

hardState.name: The Orca Incursion
hardState.description: External threats unite the colonies against common enemies

hardState.name: The Frozen Peace
hardState.description: Rebuilding and consolidation after the wars

hardState.name: Chillwalker Ethereal Cavern
hardState.description: A mystical ethereal cavern manifesting magical energies

hardState.name: Aurorabreaker Ley Nexus
hardState.description: A mystical ley nexus manifesting magical energies

hardState.name: Circle of the Depths
hardState.description: A mystical cult drawn to the power near Chillwalker Ethereal Cavern

hardState.name: Prophet Stormdiver
hardState.description: The enigmatic prophet of Circle of the Depths

hardState.name: Improved Navigation Tech
hardState.description: Innovation developed by The Icebound Exchange

hardState.name: Mystic Ice Cavern
hardState.description: A mystical site where Fissure-Drawn Runes manifests with unusual intensity

hardState.name: The Shimmering Chasm
hardState.description: A mystical site where Fissure-Drawn Runes manifests with unusual intensity

hardState.name: Blizzardhunter Pristine Plateau
hardState.description: A newly discovered pristine plateau during the The Great Thaw

hardState.name: Aurora Stack Defense edict
hardState.description: Emergency measure enacted in Aurora Stack

hardState.name: Sonic Fish Herding
hardState.description: A discovery in materials science developed by Circle of the Depths at Nightfall Shelf

hardState.name: Nightfall Shelf Rationing taboo
hardState.description: Emergency measure enacted in Nightfall Shelf

hardState.name: Fallen Heroes Day
hardState.description: A great festival celebrating shared history and fallen heroes, held in Aurora Stack

hardState.name: Nightfall Shelf Rationing edict
hardState.description: Emergency measure enacted in Nightfall Shelf (related to Nightfall Shelf Rationing taboo)

hardState.name: Glow Ward
hardState.description: Mystical ability discovered by Fissure-Walker Draen related to Fissure-Drawn Runes

hardState.name: Frost-Hardened Tools
hardState.description: A advancement in navigation developed by The Icebound Exchange at Aurora Stack

hardState.name: The Fortune Era
hardState.description: Economic prosperity driven by 4 trade connections

history.description: World initialized: 19 entities, 39 relationships
Tide-Splitter Rukan discovered ethereal cavern driven by magic pressure
Fissure-Walker Draen discovered ley nexus driven by magic pressure
Circle of the Depths forms with Prophet Stormdiver as prophet and 1 followers
The Icebound Exchange develops new technology
Prophet Stormdiver discovers Mystic Ice Cavern, where Fissure-Drawn Runes manifests
Circle of the Depths expands control to Nightfall Shelf (catalyzed by Circle of the Depths)
Prophet Stormdiver discovers The Shimmering Chasm, where Fissure-Drawn Runes manifests
Tide-Splitter Rukan discovered pristine plateau while exploring
New edict enacted in Aurora Stack
Circle of the Depths develops Sonic Fish Herding for Circle of the Depths at Nightfall Shelf
The Midnight Claws expands control to Aurora Stack (catalyzed by The Midnight Claws)
The Midnight Claws establishes trade route with The Icebound Exchange (catalyzed by The Midnight Claws)
New taboo enacted in Nightfall Shelf
The Midnight Claws establishes trade route with Circle of the Depths (catalyzed by The Midnight Claws)
Fallen Heroes Day established in Aurora Stack, bringing together 3 factions in celebration
New edict enacted in Nightfall Shelf (related to Nightfall Shelf Rationing taboo)
Fissure-Walker Draen discovers Glow Ward at The Glow-Fissure related to Fissure-Drawn Runes
The Icebound Exchange develops Frost-Hardened Tools for The Icebound Exchange at Aurora Stack building on Sonic Fish Herding
The Fortune Era begins as trade flourishes
Systems: +0 relationships, 6 modifications
